contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.autores.AutoresponderEmailBodyContentHTML:
Welcome to the Kentico Community Portal 🎉🎉

Here's some additional links you might find helpful

  • Customize your profile by adding an avatar, sharing where you work, and selecting the badges you want show off around the Kentico Community Portal
  • Learn what we've added to Xperience by Kentico by reading our Refresh announcement blog posts
  • Join Kentico's Q&A discussions where you can ask questions about working with Xperience by Kentico and other digital marketing topics
  • Sign up for the Kentico Community Newsletter and stay up to date with everything going on in the community
  • Request support for any bugs or issues you find in Xperience by Kentico or our SaaS offering
  • Explore the Community Portal Resource Hub where you can find links to many other Kentico resources

Go ahead and explore the portal and thanks for joining!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.autores.EmailPreviewText: It's dangerous to go alone, take this 🗺️
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.autores.EmailSubject: Welcome to the Kentico Community Portal
